WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is not an issue.- getValue() returns the value set for a cell (either static or a formula).- getCalculatedValue() returns the "display" value for a cell, either static value or a formula result
WorkItem.Description: The PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007 class doesn't initialise "str" values when the cell also contain a formula. Therefor, when using getValue() to retrieve a cell value, it returns the cells formula instead. There is no way to retrieve the actual value. I feel the cells value should be initialized by the "str" default and an optional function (getFormula()?) should be added for proper functioning.
WorkItem.Summary: getValue() returns formula instead of value when reading excel 2007 documents
